text: The Canary Islands Mathematics House are a couple of places or museums of mathematics that are located in Tenerife and Gran Canaria. == Tenerife == The House Museum of Educational Mathematics of Tenerife was founded in 2012. It is located in Cercado Mesa, Tenerife. == Gran Canaria == The House Museum of Mathematics of Gran Canaria was founded in 2022. It is located in La Isleta, Gran Canaria. == References == Category:Museums in Spain
title: Canary Islands Mathematics House
